Document.TEXT: Colour: White Body Style: Hatchback Description: Insurance Group 10, Franchise Approved, Driver & Passenger Air Bags, ABS Electronically Controlled With Brake Assist System,15 inch 5- Spoke Alloy Wheels With Locking Wheelnuts,Air Conditioning & Air Recirculation Function Manual,Passenger Airbag Cut Off Switch,Bluetooth,6.1 inch Touch Screen Display,Power Assisted Steering - Speed Sensitive Electric Control,Central Double Locking With Remote Activation,Green Tinted Glass,Driver Knee Airbags,Side Curtain Airbags,Front Side Airbags,Child Seat Fixings - ISO-FIX Outer Rear Seats,Transponder Key Engine Immobiliser,Trip Computer,Electrically Adjustable Exterior Mirrors,AM / FM Radio With Preset Settings,Electric Windows,Black Front Grille With Smoked Chrome Garnish & Boot Trim,Mirrors And Door Handles Colour Keyed,Front And Rear Colour Keyed Bumpers,Front Fog Lights,Ad Steering Column/Wheel - Tilt And Telescopic Adjustment,Rear Wiper Intermittent Sweep,60/40 Split Fold Rear Seat Back,Toyota Touch Audio System Inc. Bluetooth USB & Ipod Port,Rear Screen - Heated,Audio Control Steering Wheel Mounted,Cupholders Front X 2 & Rear X 1,Rear View Camera,6 Speed Manual Gear Box,Rev Counter,High Mounted Stop Lamp,Headrests Front And 3 Rear Height Adjustable,Upholstery Cloth,Bottle Holders,Side Impact Beams On All Side Doors,Seatbelt Front Electronic Sensor Pre-Tensioner,Interior Tailgate Pull Handle,Front Disc Brakes Ventilated, Rear Drum Brakes,Vanity Mirrors - Driver And Passenger With Cover,Analogue Odometer,Engine Management Warning,Remote Release Fuel Cap And Location Indicator,Emergency Locking Retractors Seatbelts Outer ELR & ALR,Front Map And Room Lamp And Load Area Lamp,Fully Trimmed Boot,Electronic Brake Force Distribution,Cloth interior
